subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Social Media
World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: This year’s tournament is notable for a widespread use of social media by athletes eager to issue confessions, explanations and interpretations after controversial incidents.
